CustomField.formula: IF( AND(not isblank (Zone_dimplantation__c),DISTANCE( Long_Lat_adresse_de_livraison__c , Zone_dimplantation__r.Centroide__c , 'km')< Zone_dimplantation__r.Dmax__c), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red"))
CustomField.label: DMax Respect√©e
